price: Dájúdájú àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra wà fún àwọn olùbẹ̀rù Allāhu lọ́dọ̀ Olúwa wọn.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
